TopicTitle: The game I've been looking for all my life!

Articles.Content:
New to the forums.

Love the game, not done anything other than try to make a perfect rocket! Looking forward to making the trip to Mun!

Welcome to the forums!

Glad to hear you've been enjoying the game so far. Hope you make it to the Mun, and don't be afraid to ask questions if you're having a hard time getting there, or to let us know when you do so that we can pass around our congratulations.

New to the forums.

Love the game, not done anything other than try to make a perfect rocket! Looking forward to making the trip to Mun!

Interesting i though you would be playing something like this.

http://clickingbad.nullism.com/

I only cook during my breaks from Kerbal.
There's no such thing as a "perfect" rocket. Not yet. Whackjob's still working on it

There's no such thing as a "perfect" rocket. Not yet. Whackjob's still working on it

I like to think, any rocket that doesnt crash, blow up, runs out of fuel before its destination can be considered perfect
